I was born and raised in Honolulu, Hawaii. I attended 'Iolani School and attended St. Olaf College in Northfield Minnesota to further my academic and athletic career playing baseball. However, this past year I made the decision to transfer home to Chaminade University where I am currently studying Data Science and continuing to play baseball.
